sentence.Network_en: We have to develop a less amateurish approach to our organisa-tions.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须使我们对待自己组织的态度变得较为专业。

sentence.Network_en: He scoffed at our amateurish attempts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对我们不在行的尝试嗤之以鼻。

sentence.Network_en: The concert was rather an amateurish affair.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场音乐会颇有些外行客串的味道.

entry.tran: 业余水准的；不熟练的；（像）外行的
entry.def: If you describe something as amateurish, you think that it is not skilfully made or done.

example.ex: We have to develop a less amateurish approach to our organisations...
example.tran: 我们必须使我们对待自己组织的态度变得较为专业。
这些画作看起来只具备业余水准。
